game.name: Circle Pool
game.description:
Hey boys! Are you a kind of player who loves spending good time on the pool board? If yes, this brand new sports game is just for you. Join Circle Pool and show off the world that you are the best pool player on this planet! Remember this is a unique type of pool game where you have to chain explosions to clear each and every level. Find the white ball on the board and push it to crash the other balls!

Well, there are no holes and you would see lots of balls on the screen to handle. Try to him them hard to make chain explosions to clear each level in this cool html5 pool game! Here the problem is that you would have limited moves to complete your task. So, be careful while hitting each ball. You would see your ball exploding with the fire after each hit. Clear each and every ball from the board instead of dropping them into the pockets in different 100 levels!

This highly addictive pool game will test your pool playing abilities and hand-eye coordination skills. Make sure to push the white ball to crash all the other balls you see on the screen. Good luck to try out more arcade fun challenges on your website and allow yourself to have a blast online for free without download games in your device! Our extensive collection of physics pool games will definitely help you find something that suits your interest and needs in just a few clicks.
